selectApplet

public boolean selectApplet(byte[] aid,
                            int readerIndex)
Selects an Applet with the specified Applet id (aid) and reader specified by readerIndex

Parameters:
aid - Applet ID
readerIndex - index of the terminal that the secure element is connected to
Returns:
true if Applet selection is successful, false otherwise

sendCommand

public byte[] sendCommand(byte[] cmdApdu)
Sends the command buffer to the applet currently selected

Parameters:
cmdApdu - ISO/IEC 7816-4 Command APDU buffer
Returns:
ISO/IEC 7816-4 Response APDU buffer

getElapsedTime

public long getElapsedTime()
returns the response time of the secure element of the immediate Command-Response exchange before this method call

Returns:
Response time with nano second precision
